trigger.Name: RolikBegin_BOOOM
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
PlayCustomMusic("Battle01")
Fly("BOOOM_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 15, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("RolikEnd_BOOOM") TActivate("trBOOOM_cam01")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trBOOOM_cam01
trigger.script:
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false )
TActivate("trBOOOM_cam011")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trBOOOM_cam011
trigger.script:
local br = GetEntityByName("BridgeForDestroy") if br then br:Remove() end
local rrr = GetEntityByName ("zagr1") if rrr then rrr:Remove() end local rrr = GetEntityByName ("zagr2") if rrr then rrr:Remove() end
CreateNewDummyObject( "bridge_military_stat", "Bridge_Stat", -1, -1, CVector(5576.837, 202.8, 1423.237), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.7086, 0.0000, 0.7056), 0)
CreateNewObject { prototypeName = "Breakable_bridge_military_move", objName = "Bridge_Move" }
local bmm = GetEntityByName("Bridge_Move") if bmm then bmm:SetPosition( CVector(5576.837, 205, 1423.237)) bmm:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.0000, 0.7086, 0.0000, 0.7056)) bmm:SetDestroyed() end
CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_BRIDGE_EXP_MAIN", CVector(5535.000, 206, 1423.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_BRIDGE_EXP_MAIN", CVector(5545.000, 213, 1425.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_BRIDGE_EXP_MAIN", CVector(5555.000, 209, 1422.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000)
CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_PLASMAWATERSPLASH", CVector(5535.000, 202, 1423.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_PLASMAWATERSPLASH", CVector(5545.000, 202, 1425.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_PLASMAWATERSPLASH", CVector(5555.000, 202, 1422.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000)
AddCinematicMessage( 1, 5 )
TActivate("trBOOOM_cam02")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trBOOOM_cam02
trigger.script:
CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_BRIDGE_EXP_MAIN", CVector(5595.000, 205, 1422.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_BRIDGE_EXP_MAIN", CVector(5605.000, 211, 1424.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_BRIDGE_EXP_MAIN", CVector(5615.000, 208, 1423.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000)
CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_PLASMAWATERSPLASH", CVector(5595.000, 202, 1422.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_PLASMAWATERSPLASH", CVector(5605.000, 202, 1424.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_PLASMAWATERSPLASH", CVector(5615.000, 202, 1423.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000)
TActivate("trBOOOM_cam03")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trBOOOM_cam03
trigger.script:
CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_BRIDGE_EXP_MAIN", CVector(5565.000, 210, 1424.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_BRIDGE_EXP_MAIN", CVector(5575.000, 217, 1423.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_BRIDGE_EXP_MAIN", CVector(5585.000, 214, 1425.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000)
CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_PLASMAWATERSPLASH", CVector(5565.000, 202, 1424.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_PLASMAWATERSPLASH", CVector(5575.000, 202, 1423.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_PLASMAWATERSPLASH", CVector(5585.000, 202, 1425.000), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 600000)
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikEnd_BOOOM
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
TDeactivate("RolikBegin_BOOOM") TDeactivate("trBOOOM_cam01") TDeactivate("trBOOOM_cam02") TDeactivate("trBOOOM_cam03")
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikBegin_FATHERHOUSE
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
Fly("FATHERHOUSE_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 20, 1, 0 ) Fly("FATHERHOUSE_cam02", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 9, 0, 0 ) Fly("FATHERHOUSE_cam03", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 10, 0, 0 ) Fly("FATHERHOUSE_cam04", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 15, 0, 0 ) Fly("FATHERHOUSE_cam05", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 20, 0, 0 ) Fly("FATHERHOUSE_cam06", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 9, 0, 0 ) Fly("FATHERHOUSE_cam07", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 15, 0, 0 ) Fly("FATHERHOUSE_cam08", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 15, 0, 0 ) Fly("FATHERHOUSE_cam09", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 6, 0, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam01") TActivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam02") TActivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam03") TActivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam04") TActivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam05") TActivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam06") TActivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam07") TActivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam08") TActivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam09") TActivate("RolikEnd_FATHERHOUSE")
PlayCustomMusic("Techno04")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trFATHERHOUSE_cam01
trigger.script:
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false )
CreateNewObject{prototypeName = "InFatherHause_01",objName = "FathHause",belong = 1100} getObj("FathHause"):SetPosition( CVector(6456.201, 260.465, 5863.605)) CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller_player", "humPlayer", -1, -1, CVector(6457.741, 257.799, 5861.850), Quaternion(0.000, -0.174, 0.000, 0.985), 0)
AddCinematicMessage( 4, 1 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trFATHERHOUSE_cam02
trigger.script:
AddCinematicMessage( 401, 0.25 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trFATHERHOUSE_cam03
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("Techno01")
AddCinematicMessage( 402, 0.25 )
local humPl = GetEntityByName("humPlayer") if humPl then humPl:SetPosition( CVector(6459.136, 257.599, 5861.813)) humPl:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.016, 0.888, -0.031, 0.459)) end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trFATHERHOUSE_cam04
trigger.script:
AddCinematicMessage( 403, 0.25 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trFATHERHOUSE_cam05
trigger.script:
AddCinematicMessage( 404, 0.1 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trFATHERHOUSE_cam06
trigger.script:
AddCinematicMessage( 405, 0.25 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trFATHERHOUSE_cam07
trigger.script:
AddCinematicMessage( 406, 0.25 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trFATHERHOUSE_cam08
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("QuietDialogue01")
AddCinematicMessage( 407, 0.1 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trFATHERHOUSE_cam09
trigger.script:
AddCinematicMessage( 408, 0.25 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikEnd_FATHERHOUSE
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local house = GetEntityByName("FathHause") if house then house:Remove() end local humPl = GetEntityByName("humPlayer") if humPl then humPl:Remove() end
TDeactivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam01") TDeactivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam02") TDeactivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam03") TDeactivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam04") TDeactivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam05") TDeactivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam06") TDeactivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam07") TDeactivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam08") TDeactivate("trFATHERHOUSE_cam09") TDeactivate("RolikBegin_FATHERHOUSE") TActivate("trStopMusic")
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trStopMusic
trigger.script:
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikBegin_FATHERHOUSERETURN
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue01")
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
Fly("FATHERHOUSERETURN_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 15, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("RolikEnd_FATHERHOUSERETURN") TActivate("trFATHERHOUSERETURN_cam01")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trFATHERHOUSERETURN_cam01
trigger.script:
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false )
CreateNewObject{prototypeName = "InFatherHause_02",objName = "FathHause",belong = 1100} getObj("FathHause"):SetPosition( CVector(6456.201, 260.465, 5863.605)) CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller_player", "humPlayer", -1, -1, CVector(6457.741, 257.799, 5861.850), Quaternion(0.000, -0.174, 0.000, 0.985), 0)
AddCinematicMessage( 30, 5 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikEnd_FATHERHOUSERETURN
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local house = GetEntityByName("FathHause") if house then house:Remove() end local humPl = GetEntityByName("humPlayer") if humPl then humPl:Remove() end
TDeactivate("RolikBegin_FATHERHOUSERETURN") TDeactivate("trFATHERHOUSERETURN_cam01")
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikBegin_SPYMER
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("Passage03a")
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
CreateVehicleEx("r1m3_MerScout","vehMer",( CVector(6226,277,6001) )) CreateNewDummyObject( "cargo", "CamTochka", -1, -1, CVector(6311.421, 280.051, 5881.835), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 0)
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() local vehM = GetEntityByName("vehMer") local CToch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka") local vehMID = vehM:GetId() local CTochID = CToch:GetId() if vehM then vehM:SetSkin(1) vehM:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.001, 0.585, 0.003, 0.811)) vehM:SetExternalPathByName("SPYMERrolik_path") end if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(6255.426, 279.764, 5912.385)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.011, -0.989, 0.011, -0.149)) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) end
FlyLinked( "SPYMER_cam01", CTochID, 15, 0, 1, vehMID ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("RolikEnd_SPYMER")
AddCinematicMessage( 16, 3 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikEnd_SPYMER
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local vehM = GetEntityByName("vehMer") if vehM then vehM:Remove() end local Toch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka") if Toch then Toch:Remove() end
TeamCreate("MerCar",1045,CVector(6085.822, 277, 5781.580),{"r1m3_MerScout"}) local veh = GetEntityByName("MerCar_vehicle_0") if veh then veh:SetSkin(1) veh:SetExternalPathByName("mer_path") end
TActivate("RUNMER") TActivate("RUNMEREND")
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikBegin_THESPY
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
CreateVehicleEx("r1m1_scout03","vehMer",( CVector(0, 0, 0) )) CreateNewDummyObject( "cargo", "CamTochka", -1, -1, CVector(5343.372, 241.556, 4436.097), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 0)
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() local vehM = GetEntityByName("vehMer") local vehMID = vehM:GetId() local CToch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka") local CTochID = CToch:GetId()
FlyLinked( "THESPY_cam01", CTochID, 15, 1, 0, vehMID ) Fly("THESPY_cam02", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 15, 0, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("trTHESPY_fade") TActivate("trTHESPY_cam02") TActivate("RolikEnd_THESPY")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trTHESPY_fade
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("Bio02")
local r = GetEntityByName ("MerCar") if r then r:Remove() end
local vehM = GetEntityByName("vehMer") local vehMID = vehM:GetId() if vehM then vehM:SetSkin(1) vehM:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(5201.744, 231.394, 4457.893)) vehM:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.013, 0.977, -0.081, 0.197)) vehM:SetExternalPathByName("TheSpyMerRolik_path") end
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(5059.046, 247.471, 4256.553)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.039, 0.963, 0.102, 0.247)) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trTHESPY_cam02
trigger.script:
TActivate("trTHESPY_Out")
local vehM = GetEntityByName("vehMer") if vehM then vehM:PlaceToEndOfPath("TheSpyMerRolik_path") vehM:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(5015.094, 201.171, 4039.513)) vehM:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.011, 0.959, -0.006, 0.283)) end
AddCinematicMessage( 17, 1 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trTHESPY_Out
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("Passage03a")
local vehM = GetEntityByName("vehMer") if vehM then vehM:SetExternalPathByName("OutSpyMerRolik_path") end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikEnd_THESPY
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local vehM = GetEntityByName("vehMer") if vehM then vehM:Remove() end local Toch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka") if Toch then Toch:Remove() end
TDeactivate("RolikBegin_THESPY") TDeactivate("trTHESPY_cam02") TDeactivate("trTHESPY_Out") TDeactivate("trTHESPY_fade")
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikBegin_Tunel
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("Bio07unloop")
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
Fly("Tunel_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 10, 1, 0 ) Fly("Tunel_cam02", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 15, 0, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate( "trTunel_cam01" ) TActivate( "trTunel_cam02" ) TActivate( "RolikEnd_Tunel" )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trTunel_cam01
trigger.script:
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(1509.213, 290.107, 5539.455)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.059, -0.707, -0.033, 0.704)) vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 1 ) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 10 ) vehPlayer:SetExternalPathByName("player_path01") vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trTunel_cam02
trigger.script:
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller_player", "humPlayer", -1, -1, CVector(1466.568, 292.363, 5546.978), Quaternion(0.000, -0.731, 0.000, 0.682), 0)
if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) vehPlayer:PlaceToEndOfPath("player_path01") end
AddCinematicMessage( 5, 1 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikEnd_Tunel
trigger.script:
GameFiltersUse()
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() local humPl = GetEntityByName("humPlayer") if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:PlaceToEndOfPath("player_path01") vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) end if humPl then humPl:Remove() end
TDeactivate( "trTunel_cam02" ) TDeactivate( "RolikBegin_Tunel" )
TActivate("ZASADATUNEL")
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikBegin_Zasada
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
CreateVehicleEx("r1m3_hunter02","vehPioneer",( CVector(0, 10000, 0) )) CreateNewDummyObject( "cargo", "CamTochka", -1, -1, CVector(1757.628, 285.696, 5439.641), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 0)
local vehP = GetEntityByName("vehPioneer") local vehPID = vehP:GetId() local CToch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka") local CTochID = CToch:GetId()
Fly("Zasada_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 15, 1, 0 ) FlyLinked( "Zasada_cam02", CTochID, 20, 0, 1, vehPID ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("RolikEnd_Zasada") TActivate("trZasada_cam01") TActivate("trZasada_cam02")
AddCinematicMessage( 6, 1 ) AddCinematicMessage( 7, 1 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trZasada_cam01
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("Bio02")
local vehP = GetEntityByName("vehPioneer") if vehP then vehP:SetSkin(4) vehP:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(1519.417, 288.746, 5535.580)) end
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(1857.347, 279.391, 5419.806)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.051, 0.656, -0.028, -0.752)) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trZasada_cam02
trigger.script:
local vehP = GetEntityByName("vehPioneer") if vehP then vehP:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.039, 0.778, -0.046, 0.626)) vehP:SetExternalPathByName("vehPioneer_path") end
AddCinematicMessage( 8, 0.5 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikEnd_Zasada
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local vehP = GetEntityByName("vehPioneer") local Toch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka")
if vehP then vehP:Remove() end if Toch then Toch:Remove() end
TDeactivate( "trZasada_cam02" ) TDeactivate( "RolikBegin_Zasada" )
TeamCreate("Pioneer",1046,CVector(1915.345, 0, 5501.671),{"r1m3_hunter02"})
local vehP = GetEntityByName("Pioneer_vehicle_0") if vehP then vehP:SetSkin(4) vehP:SetExternalPathByName("pioneer_path") SetCameraDirectionToObj( vehP:GetId() ) end
TActivate( "RUNTOPIONEER" ) TActivate( "PIONEERDEAD" ) TActivate( "PIONEERASGARD" )
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikBegin_PIONEERASGARD
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
CreateVehicleEx("r1m3_hunter02","vehPioneer",CVector(0, 10000, 0)) CreateNewDummyObject( "cargo", "CamTochka", -1, -1, CVector(3722.334, 302.636, 6176.265), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 0)
local vehP = GetEntityByName("vehPioneer") local vehPID = vehP:GetId() local CToch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka") local CTochID = CToch:GetId()
FlyLinked( "PIONEERASGARD_cam01", CTochID, 10, 1, 0, vehPID ) Fly("PIONEERASGARD_cam02", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 20, 0, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("trPIONEERASGARD_cam01") TActivate("trPIONEERASGARD_cam02") TActivate("RolikEnd_PIONEERASGARD")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trPIONEERASGARD_cam01
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("Bio02")
local vehP = GetEntityByName("vehPioneer") if vehP then vehP:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(3649.857, 290.299, 6200.682)) vehP:SetSkin(4) vehP:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.041, 0.442, 0.017, 0.896)) vehP:SetThrottle( 1 ) vehP:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 30 ) vehP:SetExternalPathByName("PIONEERASGARD_path") end
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(3558.740, 285.707, 6135.220)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.030, 0.443, 0.015, 0.896)) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) end
local veh= GetEntityByName("Pioneer_vehicle_0") if veh then veh:Remove () end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trPIONEERASGARD_cam02
trigger.script:
AddCinematicMessage( 10, 3 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikEnd_PIONEERASGARD
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local vehP = GetEntityByName("vehPioneer") local Toch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka")
if vehP then vehP:Remove() end if Toch then Toch:Remove() end
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(3558.740, 285.707, 6135.220)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.030, 0.443, 0.015, 0.896)) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) end
TDeactivate( "trPIONEERASGARD_cam02" ) TDeactivate( "RolikBegin_PIONEERASGARD" ) TDeactivate( "trPIONEERASGARD_cam01")
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikBegin_LISAAFTERTHIEF
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false )
CreateVehicleEx("LisaCar","vehLisa_0",( CVector(0, 10000, 0) ))
local vehLisa = GetEntityByName("vehLisa_0") local vehLisaID = vehLisa:GetId() local idn01 = GetPlayerVehicleId()
Fly("LISAAFTERTHIEF_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 13, 1, 0 ) Fly("LISAAFTERTHIEF_cam02", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 20, 0, 0 ) FlyLinked( "LISAAFTERTHIEF_cam031", idn01, 15, 0, 1, vehLisaID ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("RolikEnd_LISAAFTERTHIEF") TActivate("trLISAAFTERTHIEF_cam01") TActivate("trLISAAFTERTHIEF_cam02") TActivate("trLISAAFTERTHIEF_cam031") TActivate( "trMsg01" )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trLISAAFTERTHIEF_cam01
trigger.script:
local vehLisa = GetEntityByName("vehLisa_0") if vehLisa then vehLisa:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(6155.302, 258.301, 7752.490)) vehLisa:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.006, -0.997, -0.030, 0.068)) vehLisa:SetThrottle(1) vehLisa:SetCustomLinearVelocity(5) vehLisa:SetExternalPathByName("lisa_path01") vehLisa:SetSkin(2) end
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(6140.754, 259.915, 7647.122)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.014, 0.087, -0.007, 0.996)) vehPlayer:SetExternalPathByName("player_path02") vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) end
AddCinematicMessage( 32, 3 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trMsg01
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue02")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trLISAAFTERTHIEF_cam02
trigger.script:
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() local vehLisa = GetEntityByName("vehLisa_0")
if vehLisa then vehLisa:PlaceToEndOfPath("lisa_path01") vehLisa:SetThrottle( 0 ) end
if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:PlaceToEndOfPath("player_path02") vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) end
CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller_player", "humPlayer", -1, -1, CVector(6153.229, 254.978, 7704.235), Quaternion(0.000, -0.993, 0.000, -0.120), 0) CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller_lisa", "humLisa", -1, -1, CVector(6153.725, 254.982, 7702.738), Quaternion(0.000, -0.156, 0.000, 0.988), 0)
getObj("humPlayer"):SetNodeAction(AT_STAND1) getObj("humPlayer"):SetNextForAnimation(AT_STAND1, AT_RESERVED1, AT_STAND2, AT_STAND1) getObj("humLisa"):SetNodeAction(AT_STAND2) getObj("humLisa"):SetNextForAnimation(AT_STAND2, AT_STAND2)
AddCinematicMessage( 33, 0.5 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trLISAAFTERTHIEF_cam031
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("Passage02b")
local vehLisa = GetEntityByName("vehLisa_0") if vehLisa then getObj("humLisa"):Remove() vehLisa:SetThrottle( 1 ) vehLisa:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 30 ) vehLisa:SetExternalPathByName("lisa_path02") end
getObj("humPlayer"):SetNodeAction(AT_STAND2) getObj("humPlayer"):SetNextForAnimation(AT_STAND2, AT_RESERVED1, AT_RESERVED1, AT_STAND1)
AddCinematicMessage( 34, 1 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikEnd_LISAAFTERTHIEF
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local vehLisa = GetEntityByName("vehLisa_0") if vehLisa then vehLisa:Remove() end
local humLisa = getObj("humLisa") if humLisa then humLisa:Remove() end
local humPlayer = getObj("humPlayer") if humPlayer then humPlayer:Remove() end
TDeactivate( "trMsg01" ) TDeactivate( "trLISAAFTERTHIEF_cam01") TDeactivate( "trLISAAFTERTHIEF_cam02" ) TDeactivate( "trLISAAFTERTHIEF_cam03") TDeactivate( "RolikBegin_LISAAFTERTHIEF" )
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikBegin_ORACLEABOTPLATE
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("Techno02")
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
Fly("ORACLEABOTPLATE_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 28, 1, 0 ) Fly("ORACLEABOTPLATE_cam02", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 43, 0, 0 ) Fly("ORACLEABOTPLATE_cam03", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 27, 0, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("RolikEnd_ORACLEABOTPLATE") TActivate("trORACLEABOTPLATE_cam01") TActivate("trORACLEABOTPLATE_cam02") TActivate("trORACLEABOTPLATE_cam03")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trORACLEABOTPLATE_cam01
trigger.script:
local bossOracle = GetEntityByName("OracleFlyBoss_Rolik")
if bossOracle then bossOracle:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.022, 0.998, 0.016, -0.050)) bossOracle:SetPosition( CVector(6164.257, 300.479, 7800.305)) end
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(6140.754, 259.915, 7647.122)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.014, 0.087, -0.007, 0.996)) vehPlayer:SetExternalPathByName("player_path02") vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) end
AddCinematicMessage( 3412, 1 ) AddCinematicMessage( 35, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 36, 1 ) AddCinematicMessage( 361, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 3610, 0.1 )
trigger:Deactivate()

if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:PlaceToEndOfPath("player_path02") vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) end
AddCinematicMessage( 362, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 363, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 364, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 365, 0.5 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.script:
AddCinematicMessage( 366, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 367, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 368, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 369, 0.5 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikEnd_ORACLEABOTPLATE
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local bossOracle = GetEntityByName("OracleFlyBoss_Rolik") local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle()
if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:PlaceToEndOfPath("player_path02") vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) end
if bossOracle then bossOracle:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.022, 0.998, 0.016, -0.050)) bossOracle:SetPosition( CVector(7640.151, 236.887, 7807.008)) end
TDeactivate( "trORACLEABOTPLATE_cam01") TDeactivate( "trORACLEABOTPLATE_cam02" ) TDeactivate( "trORACLEABOTPLATE_cam03") TDeactivate( "RolikBegin_ORACLEABOTPLATE" )
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikBegin_ORACLEAGRESSOR
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
PlayCustomMusic("Techno02")
local vehBoss = GetEntityByName("OracleFlyBoss_Rolik") local idn01 = GetPlayerVehicleId() local vehBossID = vehBoss:GetId()
Fly("ORACLEAGRESSOR_cam01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 19, 1, 0) FlyLinked("ORACLEAGRESSOR_cam02", vehBossID, 23, 0, 0, idn01 ) FlyLinked("ORACLEAGRESSOR_cam03", idn01, 15, 0, 1, vehBossID ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("RolikEnd_ORACLEAGRESSOR") TActivate("trORACLEAGRESSOR_cam01") TActivate("trORACLEAGRESSOR_cam02") TActivate("trORACLEAGRESSOR_cam03")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trORACLEAGRESSOR_cam01
trigger.script:
CreateNewDummyObject( "big_crag_2", "qa1", -1, -1, CVector(2327, 260, 5694), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 0) CreateNewDummyObject( "big_crag_2", "qa2", -1, -1, CVector(2341, 255, 5822), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 0) CreateNewDummyObject( "big_crag_2", "qa3", -1, -1, CVector(2839, 260, 5801), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 0) CreateNewDummyObject( "big_crag_7", "qa4", -1, -1, CVector(2833, 270, 5892), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 0) CreateNewDummyObject( "big_crag_7", "qa5", -1, -1, CVector(2333, 270, 5775), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 0)
local bossOracle = GetEntityByName("OracleFlyBoss_Rolik") if bossOracle then bossOracle:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.039, 0.918, -0.093, -0.383)) bossOracle:SetPosition( CVector(2540.916, 341.577, 5954.685)) end
local moverId = CreateNewObject { prototypeName = "cinematicMover", objName = "MoverB" } local mover = GetEntityByID( moverId ) if bossOracle then mover:SetObjAndPath( bossOracle:GetId(), "boss03Move", 37 ) end
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(2733.191, 277.533, 5836.819)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.016, -0.720, 0.004, 0.693)) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) end
AddCinematicMessage( 3001, 1 ) AddCinematicMessage( 3002, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 3003, 0.5 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trORACLEAGRESSOR_cam02
trigger.script:
AddCinematicMessage( 3004, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 3005, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 3006, 0.5 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trORACLEAGRESSOR_cam03
trigger.script:
AddCinematicMessage( 3007, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 3008, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 3009, 0.5 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RolikEnd_ORACLEAGRESSOR
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus() SetTolerance( 1100, 1049, RS_ENEMY )
local BossRolik = GetEntityByName("OracleFlyBoss_Rolik") if BossRolik then -- BossRolik:SetPosition( CVector(7640.151, 236.887, 7807.008)) BossRolik:Remove() end
TDeactivate( "trORACLEAGRESSOR_cam01") TDeactivate( "trORACLEAGRESSOR_cam02" ) TDeactivate( "trORACLEAGRESSOR_cam03")
TDeactivate("ORACLEHACK")
TActivate("TRIGGER_ORACLEAGRESSORDIE")
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
local bossp = GetEntityByName("OracleFlyBoss") if bossp then ShowBossIndicator(bossp:GetId()) bossp:SetPosition(CVector(2540.916, 341.577, 5954.685)) bossp:NoticePlayer() end
trigger:Deactivate()
